text: @SouthernOracle4 "Because if you don't want to worry anyone," said Magrat, eventually.

passages.full_quote: <used>Because if you don't</used> dance to the rhythm of the slam you'll dance with the Devil soon enough

passages.full_quote: "I <used>don't want to worry anyone," said</used> Bethan, "but hasn't it struck you as unseasonably hot?"
"I think it's probably the worst thing that could happen to <used>anyone," said Magrat, a</used>s the duchess swayed backward and forward
